00063 ########################################################################
00064 # von Neumann 29 State Cellular Automata Rule Configurations
00065 # Don Hopkins
00066 
00067 
00068 NameToCode = {
00069 
00070 # These are masks that don't directly represent states.
00071 #  'CN':   0x10,       # 00010000: confluent state
00072 #  'OS':   0x20,       # 00100000: ordinary state
00073 #  'SS':   0x40,       # 01000000: special state
00074 #  'EX':   0x80,       # 10000000: excited state
00075 #  'NX':   0x7f,       # 01111111: not excited mask
00076 #  'RD':   0x00,       # 00000000: right direction
00077 #  'UD':   0x01,       # 00000001: up direction
00078 #  'LD':   0x02,       # 00000010: left direction
00079 #  'DD':   0x03,       # 00000011: down direction
00080 #  'DM':   0x03,       # 00000011: direction mask
00081 
00082   'U':    0x00,       # 00000000: unexcited state
00083 
00084   'S':    0x01,       # 00000001: sensitized state S
00085   'S0':   0x02,       # 00000010: sensitized state S0
00086   'S1':   0x03,       # 00000011: sensitized state S1
00087   'S00':  0x04,       # 00000100: sensitized state S00
00088   'S01':  0x05,       # 00000101: sensitized state S01
00089   'S10':  0x06,       # 00000110: sensitized state S10
00090   'S11':  0x07,       # 00000111: sensitized state S11
00091   'S000': 0x08,       # 00001000: sensitized state S000
00092 
00093   'C00':  0x10,       # 00010000: confluent state C00, now quiescent, next quiescent
00094   'C10':  0x11,       # 00010001: confluent state C10, now excited, next quiescent
00095   'C01':  0x90,       # 10010000: confluent state C01, now quiescent, next excited
00096   'C11':  0x91,       # 10010001: confluent state C11, now excited, next excited
00097 
00098   'OR':   0x20,       # 00100000: unexcited ordinary transmission state right
00099   'OU':   0x21,       # 00100001: unexcited ordinary transmission state up
00100   'OL':   0x22,       # 00100010: unexcited ordinary transmission state left
00101   'OD':   0x23,       # 00100011: unexcited ordinary transmission state down
00102 
00103   'SR':   0x40,       # 01000000: unexcited special transmission state right
00104   'SU':   0x41,       # 01000001: unexcited special transmission state up
00105   'SL':   0x42,       # 01000010: unexcited special transmission state left
00106   'SD':   0x43,       # 01000011: unexcited special transmission state down
00107 
00108   'ORX':  0xa0,       # 10100000: excited ordinary transmission state right
00109   'OUX':  0xa1,       # 10100001: excited ordinary transmission state up
00110   'OLX':  0xa2,       # 10100010: excited ordinary transmission state left
00111   'ODX':  0xa3,       # 10100011: excited ordinary transmission state down
00112 
00113   'SRX':  0xc0,       # 11000000: excited special transmission state right
00114   'SUX':  0xc1,       # 11000001: excited special transmission state up
00115   'SLX':  0xc2,       # 11000010: excited special transmission state left
00116   'SDX':  0xc3,       # 11000011: excited special transmission state down
00117 
00118 }
00119 
00120 
00121 CodeToName = {}
00122 for name, code in NameToCode.iteritems():
00123     CodeToName[code] = name
00124 
00125 
00126 NameToChar = {
00127   'U':    '-',
00128 
00129   'S':    '1',
00130   'S0':   '2',
00131   'S1':   '3',
00132   'S00':  '4',
00133   'S01':  '5',
00134   'S10':  '6',
00135   'S11':  '7',
00136   'S000': '8',
00137 
00138   'C00':  'q',
00139   'C10':  'e',
00140   'C01':  't',
00141   'C11':  'u',
00142 
00143   'OR':   's',
00144   'OU':   'w',
00145   'OL':   'a',
00146   'OD':   'z',
00147 
00148   'SR':   'f',
00149   'SU':   'r',
00150   'SL':   'd',
00151   'SD':   'c',
00152 
00153   'ORX':  'h',
00154   'OUX':  'y',
00155   'OLX':  'g',
00156   'ODX':  'b',
00157 
00158   'SRX':  'k',
00159   'SUX':  'i',
00160   'SLX':  'j',
00161   'SDX':  'm',
00162 
00163 }
00164 
00165 
00166 CharToName = {}
00167 CharToCode = {}
00168 for name, char in NameToChar.iteritems():
00169     CharToName[char] = name
00170     CharToCode[char] = NameToCode[name]

00266 FrameToCode = {}
